coalburner.name: Coal Burner
coalburner.description: All this coal Santa gave me will come in handy. Good source of power wherever there's coal.

oilburner.name: Oil Burner
oilburner.description: Surely this will have no unintended consequences. Good source of power wherever there's oil.

solarpanel.name: Solar Panel
solarpanel.description: Powered from the SUN! Good source of power wherever there's harsh sunlight.

windmill.name: Windmill
windmill.description: Fossil fuels are obsolete! Good source of power wherever there's strong winds.

geothermalpowerplant.name: Geothermal Power Plant
geothermalpowerplant.description: Powered from the EARTH! Very reliable as it works anywhere, but is outclassed by the others.

batterystation.name: Battery Station
batterystation.description: If there's no good source of power, why not bring it in from somewhere else?

batterycharger.name: Battery Charger
batterycharger.description: If you've got extra power, why not send it somewhere else?

treechopper9001.name: Tree Chopper 9001
treechopper9001.description: Chop down nether tree yes vroom.

automaticplasticshovel.name: Automatic Plastic Shovel
automaticplasticshovel.description: It's like a plastic shovel, but automatic.

jerrystruck.name: Jerry's Truck
jerrystruck.description: Idk how I'm gonna move all this ice, I'll just call Jerry.

blackstonequarry.name: Blackstone Quarry
blackstonequarry.description: Nothing preserves the landscape better than a giant hole in the ground. Though the nether is ugly anyway.

stonequarry.name: Stone Quarry
stonequarry.description: Nothing preserves the landscape better than a giant hole in the ground.

roboticearlybird.name: Robotic Early Bird
roboticearlybird.description: I guess a robotic early bird gets there first?

chickencoop.name: Chicken Coop
chickencoop.description: Just a bunch of chickens in a chicken coop.

mangotreeshaker.name: Mango Tree Shaker
mangotreeshaker.description: Mango on tree, shake tree, mango in hand.

automaticwatermelonfarm.name: Automatic Water Melon Farm
automaticwatermelonfarm.description: Unlike their pumpkin counterpart, melon farms are automatic!

giantpumpkinfarm.name: Giant Pumpkin Farm
giantpumpkinfarm.description: Unlike their melon counterpart, pumpkin farms are giant!

aliencropcircle.name: Alien Crop Circle
aliencropcircle.description: Offer a sacrifice to the aliens and watch as a giant circle of wheat gets harvested.

baconator.name: Baconator
baconator.description: The baconator is Wendy's key to success.

woolywheelofdoom.name: Wooly Wheel of Doom
woolywheelofdoom.description: It's a giant wooden wheel, with sheep on it, and they die.

cowchamber.name: Cow Chamber
cowchamber.description: You don't wanna know what happens in the cow chamber.

thedeluxefishslayercompositepro.name: The Deluxe Fish Slayer Composite Pro

rubbertapper.name: Rubber Tapper
rubbertapper.description: Just put this in a tree and boom.

vacuumcleaner.name: Vacuum Cleaner
vacuumcleaner.description: How would you gather clouds? I guess you could suck them with a vacuum cleaner?

loom.name: Loom
loom.description: Make your silk with a loom!

siliconextractor.name: Silicon Extractor
siliconextractor.description: Raw silicon straight from the ground.

sentientminecart.name: Sentient Minecart
sentientminecart.description: Don't even ask me how this works.

goblinminer.name: Goblin Miner
goblinminer.description: Why mine yourself if a goblin can mine for you!

villagerminer.name: Villager Miner
villagerminer.description: Why mine yourself if a villager can mine for you!
